text: The Jewish Publication Society of America Version (JPS 1917) is a version of the Tanakh, the Hebrew Bible. It was the first Bible translation published by the Jewish Publication Society of America. It is also the first translation of the Tanakh into English by a group of Jews. There had been earlier tries by individuals. For example, that of Isaac Leeser). The full publication title is The Holy Scriptures According to the Masoretic Text: A New Translation with the Aid of Previous Versions and with Constant Consultation of Jewish Authorities. == References == ==Other websites== * Online version of the Jewish Publication Society of America Version at mechon-mamre.org Category:Bible versions Category:Judaism in the United States Category:1910s books Category:1917 works
title: Jewish Publication Society of America Version
